# defaultCaptureSoundDisabled

**Type Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the default sound is in a disabled state.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor class var defaultCaptureSoundDisabled: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

If `true`, you must handle sound playback for capture events manually using the [doc://com.apple.avkit/documentation/AVKit/AVCaptureEvent/play(_:)] method.



## Inspecting the interaction

- **isEnabled**: A Boolean value that indicates whether this capture event interaction is in an enabled state.
